original: prāyeṇālokya lokaṃ viṣayaratiparaṃ mokṣāt pratihataṃ
analyzed: prāyeṇa ālokya lokam viṣaya rati param mokṣāt pratihatam

original: kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti /
analyzed: kāvya vyājena tattvam kathitam iha mayā mokṣaḥ param iti

original: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ
analyzed: tat buddhvā śamikam yat tat avahitam itas grāhyam na lalitam

original: pāṃsubhyo dhātujebhyo niyatamupakaraṃ cāmīkaramiti // Saund_18.64 //
analyzed: pāṃsubhyaḥ dhātu jebhyaḥ niyatam upakaram cāmīkaram iti

original: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñāvyākaraṇa” nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta /
